张江校区短驳班车: Shuttle Bus in Zhangjiang Hi-Tech Park
学校班车 (周末增开班次点开看详情): School Bus (Tap on for exceptions on weekends)
张江地铁站2号口（大桥六线站南侧）: Entrance 2#, Zhangjiang Hi-Tech Park Sta. (in the south of 大桥六线 bus stop)
于该时刻从环科路发车，随到即开，预计20分钟: departed at this time from Huanke Rd, re-depart on arrival in about 20 mins
于该时刻从地铁站发车，随到即开，预计20分钟: departed at this time from metro station, re-depart on arrival in about 20 mins
金科路地铁站（祖冲之路公交站台）发车: depart from Jinke Rd Sta. (bus stop on Zuchongzhi Rd)
